channel.title: AllStar-Scape - InitzOnline
channel.description:
Flame, hate, or anything doesn't matter. I'm bored and All-Star is the first source I ever played on but never tried programming on it so I decided to try out All-Star source. Base: AllStar-Scape Reason: Learning purposes. Goals: Make AllStar-Scape bug-free (if possible) and make it a non-silab source. Got a problem? Fuck off.
Updates: 5/28/11 - Downloaded All-Star source. 5/28/11 - Cleaned out Custom items (Make it compatible with 317 Deob) ------------------------------------------------------------------ 5/29/11 - Named the server - InitzOnline 5/29/11 - Fixed 2Hs 5/29/11 - HP Glitch fixed 5/29/11 - Moving Fire Capes ----------------------------- 5/31/11 - A new and improved Vengeance
Pictures: Got 317 Deob to work right for it (Will add items back with correct ints) [IMG]http://i634.photobucket.com/albums/uu63/Pysthonic/317deob.png[/img] Videos: Moving Fire Cape http://s634.photobucket.com/albums/uu63/Pysthonic/?action=view¤t=clip1136.mp4 New Vengeance (the hp in is 10/9 because I never bothered to change starting xp for 10) Coming Tomorrow.. [b]By the way, if anybody wants to help PM me.[/b]

item.title: AllStar-Scape - InitzOnline
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:23, topic:396876”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=494035.msg3612575#msg3612575 date=1306709643]

Look in the client where player rendering is handled?

It’s server sided. I know this because on a server where jaws happen to show I can see them with the same client.
[/quote]

I know the problem is server-sided, I just said that. They asked how to fix it so I told them to look in the client to see where it receives the rendering info sent by the server… You know, to make them match up correctly.[/quote]
Ah, I’ll check and see after I finish up the welcome message. Had a problem finding the variable that makes it so something is said in chatbox across the server, I tried yell(" because thats what it was in deltascape but in allstar its PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (

Read full topic

item.title: AllStar-Scape - InitzOnline
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:20, topic:396876”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=494035.msg3612547#msg3612547 date=1306708275]
Look in the client where player rendering is handled?
[/quote]
It’s server sided. I know this because on a server where jaws happen to show I can see them with the same client.[/quote]

I know the problem is server-sided, I just said that. They asked how to fix it so I told them to look in the client to see where it receives the rendering info sent by the server… You know, to make them match up correctly.

Read full topic
